message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value for you at $1,200,000. I understand the importance of this opportunity and would like to extend an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time only, I am willing to sell the product to you for $950,000. This is a special discount considering the high value it holds for you. Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer. I am confident that you will find this product to be an excellent investment for your needs.
